name: Hipoglicemia Grave
description: Alerta para hipoglicemia grave <40 mg/dL com risco de coma e dano neurológico
author: Clinical Alert Specialist
clinicalRationale: Hipoglicemia grave (<40 mg/dL) representa emergência médica com risco iminente de convulsões, coma, dano neurológico permanente e morte. Requer tratamento imediato com glucagon ou glicose IV conforme ADA 2024 Standards of Care.
references: ADA Standards of Medical Care in Diabetes 2024
Endocrine Society Clinical Practice Guideline: Evaluation and Management of Adult Hypoglycemic Disorders
